evidence: We applied POS-based reordering to improve our translations in all directions , using short-range re-ordering for English ↔ French and long-range re-ordering for English ↔ German .
text: We applied POS-based reordering to improve our translations in all directions , using short-range re-ordering for English ↔ French and long-range re-ordering for English ↔ German .

evidence: In addition , a parallel phrase scoring technique was implemented that could speed up the MT training process tremendously .
text: In addition , a parallel phrase scoring technique was implemented that could speed up the MT training process tremendously .

evidence: We have presented the systems for our participation in the WMT 2011 Evaluation for English ↔ German and English ↔ French .
text: We have presented the systems for our participation in the WMT 2011 Evaluation for English ↔ German and English ↔ French .

evidence: A Discriminative Word Alignment Model led to an increase in BLEU for English-German .
text: A Discriminative Word Alignment Model led to an increase in BLEU for English-German .
